description: This script manages automated device reboot procedures based on configuration, maintenance window, and reboot status checks. It includes timing calculations, condition checks, and external command interactions related to device rebooting logic.

methods.name: calcRandTime
methods.description: Calculates a random time within a specified window for scheduling reboot.

methods.name: checkMaintenanceWindow
methods.description: Checks if current time is within the designated maintenance window for reboot.
